verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְיִקְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> ve-yik-chu- that they bring לִ֖י li תְּרוּמָ֑ה <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-Mah; me an offering מֵאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of every man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose יִדְּבֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5068><s%> yid-de-Ven-nu that giveth it willingly לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo, with his heart תִּקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> tik-Chu ye shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תְּרוּמָתִֽי׃ <S%H8641><s%> te-ru-ma-Ti. my offering

וְזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> ve-zoT likewise הַתְּרוּמָ֔ה <S%H8641><s%> hat-te-ru-Mah, And this [is] the offering אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תִּקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> tik-Chu which ye shall take מֵאִתָּ֑ם <S%H853><s%> me-'it-Tam; זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of them gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> va-Che-sef and silver וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> u-ne-Cho-shet. and brass

וּתְכֵ֧לֶת <S%H8504><s%> u-te-Che-let And blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <S%H713><s%> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <S%H8438><s%> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <S%H8144><s%> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8336><s%> ve-Shesh and fine linen וְעִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> ve-'iz-Zim. and goats'

וְעֹרֹ֨ת <S%H5785><s%> ve-'o-Rot skins אֵילִ֧ם <S%H352><s%> 'ei-Lim And rams' מְאָדָּמִ֛ים <S%H119><s%> me-'ad-da-Mim dyed red וְעֹרֹ֥ת <S%H5785><s%> ve-'o-Rot skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <S%H8476><s%> te-cha-Shim and badgers' וַעֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> va-'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּֽים׃ <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim. and shittim

שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men Oil לַמָּאֹ֑ר <S%H3974><s%> lam-ma-'Or; for the light בְּשָׂמִים֙ <S%H1314><s%> be-sa-Mim spices לְשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> le-She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> ham-mish-Chah, for anointing וְלִקְטֹ֖רֶת <S%H7004><s%> ve-lik-To-ret incense הַסַּמִּֽים׃ <S%H5561><s%> has-sam-Mim. and for sweet

אַבְנֵי־ <S%H68><s%> 'av-nei- stones שֹׁ֕הַם <S%H7718><s%> Sho-ham Onyx וְאַבְנֵ֖י <S%H68><s%> ve-'av-Nei and stones מִלֻּאִ֑ים <S%H4394><s%> mil-lu-'Im; to be set לָאֵפֹ֖ד <S%H646><s%> la-'e-Fod in the ephod וְלַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H2833><s%> ve-la-Cho-shen. and in the breastplate

וְעָ֥שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'A-su And let them make לִ֖י li מִקְדָּ֑שׁ <S%H4720><s%> mik-Dash; me a sanctuary וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֖י <S%H7931><s%> ve-sha-chan-Ti that I may dwell בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cham. among

כְּכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol, to all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am מַרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> mar-'Eh According to all that I shew אוֹתְךָ֔ <S%H853><s%> 'ot-Cha, אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et תַּבְנִ֣ית <S%H8403><s%> tav-Nit thee [after] the pattern הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan, of the tabernacle וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תַּבְנִ֣ית <S%H8403><s%> tav-Nit and the pattern כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lav; of all the instruments וְכֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ve-Chen so תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su. thereof even so shall ye make ס sa-Mek

וְעָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Su And they shall make אֲר֖וֹן <S%H727><s%> a-Ron an ark עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim; [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֨יִם <S%H520><s%> 'am-ma-Ta-yim two cubits וָחֵ֜צִי <S%H2677><s%> va-Che-tzi and a half אָרְכּ֗וֹ <S%H753><s%> a-re-Ko, [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֤ה <S%H520><s%> ve-'am-Mah thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> va-Che-tzi and a half רָחְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bo, the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> ve-'am-Mah thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <S%H2677><s%> va-Che-tzi and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> ko-ma-To. the height

וְצִפִּיתָ֤ <S%H6823><s%> ve-tzip-pi-Ta And thou shalt overlay אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav gold טָה֔וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor, it with pure מִבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> mib-Ba-yit within וּמִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> u-mi-Chutz and without תְּצַפֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H6823><s%> te-tzap-Pen-nu; shalt thou overlay וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta it and shalt make עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and זֵ֥ר <S%H2213><s%> zer upon it a crown זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

וְיָצַ֣קְתָּ <S%H3332><s%> ve-ya-Tzak-ta And thou shalt cast לּ֗וֹ lo, אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H2885><s%> tab-be-'Ot rings זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav, of gold וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-Na-tat-Tah, for it and put עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' [them] in the four פַּעֲמֹתָ֑יו <S%H6471><s%> pa-'a-mo-Tav; corners וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Tei thereof and two טַבָּעֹ֗ת <S%H2885><s%> tab-ba-'Ot, rings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and צַלְעוֹ֙ <S%H6763><s%> tzal-'O side הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat, [shall be] in the one וּשְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Tei of it and two טַבָּעֹ֔ת <S%H2885><s%> tab-ba-'Ot, rings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and צַלְע֖וֹ <S%H6763><s%> tzal-'O side הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit. in the other

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make בַדֵּ֖י <S%H905><s%> vad-Dei staves עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim; [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <S%H6823><s%> ve-tzip-pi-Ta and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav. them with gold

וְהֵבֵאתָ֤ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-ve-Ta And thou shalt put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּדִּים֙ <S%H905><s%> hab-bad-Dim the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <S%H2885><s%> bat-tab-ba-'Ot, into the rings עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on צַלְעֹ֣ת <S%H6763><s%> tzal-'Ot by the sides הָאָרֹ֑ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron; of the ark לָשֵׂ֥את <S%H5375><s%> la-Set may be borne אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָרֹ֖ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron that the ark בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

בְּטַבְּעֹת֙ <S%H2885><s%> be-tab-be-'Ot in the rings הָאָרֹ֔ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron, of the ark יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu shall be הַבַּדִּ֑ים <S%H905><s%> hab-bad-Dim; The staves לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָסֻ֖רוּ <S%H5493><s%> ya-Su-ru they shall not be taken מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu. at

וְנָתַתָּ֖ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-ta-Ta And thou shalt put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הָאָרֹ֑ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron; into the ark אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הָעֵדֻ֔ת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut, the testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֶתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten which I shall give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha. about

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make כַפֹּ֖רֶת <S%H3727><s%> chap-Po-ret a mercy seat זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav gold טָה֑וֹר <S%H2889><s%> ta-Hor; [of] pure אַמָּתַ֤יִם <S%H520><s%> 'am-ma-Ta-yim two cubits וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> va-Che-tzi and a half אָרְכָּ֔הּ <S%H753><s%> 'a-re-Kah, [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> ve-'am-Mah thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <S%H2677><s%> va-Che-tzi and a half רָחְבָּֽהּ׃ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bah. the breadth

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim two כְּרֻבִ֖ים <S%H3742><s%> ke-ru-Vim cherubims זָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav; [of] gold מִקְשָׁה֙ <S%H4749><s%> mik-Shah [of] beaten work תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, מִשְּׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> mish-she-Nei them in the two קְצ֥וֹת <S%H7098><s%> ke-Tzot ends הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <S%H3727><s%> hak-kap-Po-ret. of the mercy seat

וַ֠עֲשֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> Va-'a-seh And make כְּר֨וּב <S%H3742><s%> ke-Ruv cherub אֶחָ֤ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one מִקָּצָה֙ <S%H7098><s%> mik-ka-Tzah on the one end מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh, on the other וּכְרוּב־ <S%H3742><s%> u-che-ruv- cherub אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad and the other מִקָּצָ֖ה <S%H7098><s%> mik-ka-Tzah end מִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh; one מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- with הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <S%H3727><s%> hak-kap-Po-ret [even] of the mercy seat תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su shall ye make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכְּרֻבִ֖ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim the cherubims עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei on the two קְצוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H7098><s%> ke-tzo-Tav. ends

וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu shall have הַכְּרֻבִים֩ <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim And the cherubims פֹּרְשֵׂ֨י <S%H6566><s%> po-re-Sei shall stretch כְנָפַ֜יִם <S%H3671><s%> che-na-Fa-yim forth [their] wings לְמַ֗עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma'-lah, on high סֹכְכִ֤ים <S%H5526><s%> so-che-Chim covering בְּכַנְפֵיהֶם֙ <S%H3671><s%> be-chan-fei-Hem with their wings עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <S%H3727><s%> hak-kap-Po-ret, the mercy seat וּפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> u-fe-nei-Hem and their faces אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish [shall look] one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- are to be toward אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv; to another אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- are to be toward הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <S%H3727><s%> hak-kap-Po-ret, toward the mercy seat יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu shall have פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei shall the faces הַכְּרֻבִֽים׃ <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim. of the cherubims

וְנָתַתָּ֧ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-ta-Ta And thou shalt put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <S%H3727><s%> hak-kap-Po-ret the mercy seat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- of הָאָרֹ֖ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron upon the ark מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> mil-Ma-'e-lah; above וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן <S%H727><s%> ha-'a-Ron, and in the ark תִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten thou shalt put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣עֵדֻ֔ת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut, the testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֶתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten that I shall give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha. about

וְנוֹעַדְתִּ֣י <S%H3259><s%> ve-no-'ad-Ti And there I will meet לְךָ֮ le-Cha שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> sham There וְדִבַּרְתִּ֨י <S%H1696><s%> ve-dib-bar-Ti with thee and I will commune אִתְּךָ֜ <S%H853><s%> 'it-te-Cha מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al which [are] upon הַכַּפֹּ֗רֶת <S%H3727><s%> hak-kap-Po-ret, with thee from above the mercy seat מִבֵּין֙ <S%H996><s%> mib-Bein from between שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei the two הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <S%H3742><s%> hak-ke-ru-Vim, cherubims אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above אֲרֹ֣ן <S%H727><s%> 'a-Ron the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut; of the testimony אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֲצַוֶּ֛ה <S%H6680><s%> 'a-tzav-Veh of all [things] which I will give thee in commandment אוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> 'ot-Cha אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- for בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh
